title: Software Engineer - Location and Spatial Awareness
summary: Help craft the next generation of capabilities leveraging Apple location and spatial awareness technologies...
description: Join a team which designs, implements, and powers brand new technologies and services on the world's fastest-growing mobile development platform...
key_qualifications: Strong software generalist and experience with object oriented languages (C++, Objective-C)...
education_experience: BS in computer science, electrical engineering, or related field with at least 6 years of relevant experience.
additional_requirements: Takes initiative to address new problems and responsibility for the results...
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role...
